document.full_text: president ra??l castro, in a speech heralding changes intended to lift cuba out of economic despair and stagnant thinking, proposed term limits in an effort to rejuvenate a system dominated by aging loyalists of the revolution.
document.title: cuban leader proposes term limits in sign of new era
